lore: Valkyries were not made to sail the skies. During the seven days of the trip to Omnia, Helmholtz modified half of the ones that accompanied him, one by one, so that they could fly. At the beginning of the siege, the Valkyrie Queens responded to the enemy arrows and spells with fire and blood. They were the first to reach the enemy ships, and they broke the barriers that protected the engines with their powerful magic. They left the rest in the hands of the Champions.
menagerieDialog: (She spends most of her free time relaxing. Is she really a Valkyrie?)
She's waving her weapon around and striking various battle poses. She must be eager to fight.
(It's completely absorbed in sharpening its weapon and polishing its armor.)
(She is extremely protective of your other creatures. If only your entire team had such camaraderie...)
(She's parading back and forth around the menagerie. You really wish she'd stand still for a moment.)
name: Valkyrie Queen
